販.definition: to deal in; to buy and sell; to trade in; to retail; to peddle

販夫俗子.definition: peddlers and common people; lower class

販夫走卒.definition: lit. peddlers and carriers; common people; lower class

販毒.definition: to traffic narcotics; drugs trade; opium trade

販賣.definition: to sell; to peddle; to traffic

販運.definition: to transport (for sale); to traffic (in sth)
